item.title: [PI]Making Teleports Cost Money to Teleport[PI]Help!
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

case ####: if(c.getItems().playerHasItem(995, AMOUNT)) { c.getPA().startTeleport(COORD X, COORD Y, 0, "modern"); c.getItems().deleteItem(995, AMOUNT); } else { c.sendMessage("You don't enough money for this portal."); } break;

item.title: [PI]Making Teleports Cost Money to Teleport[PI]Help!
item.dc:creator: @SacredHeart SacredHeart
item.description:
@SacredHeart wrote:

Case: (Portal Code): c.getPA().movePlayer(0000, 0000, 0); // You can also use c.getPA().spellTeleport(0000, 0000, 0); c.getItems().deleteItem(995, 100000000); c.teleEndAnimation = 13654; } else { sM("You need to have 100 Million coins before using this portal."); }

Read full topic
